name: Crafted_Gladiators_Armor_C
display_help: Reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses. You get the set bonuses not marked "(PvP)" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.
power_short_helps: Reduces Endurance Cost and Increases Attack Rate
